prompt: Create a simple counter app with increment and decrement buttons. Style it nicely with Tailwind CSS.
expected_features: Counter display, increment button, decrement button, Tailwind styling

prompt: Build a todo list application where users can add, complete, and delete tasks. Each task should have a checkbox and delete button.
expected_features: Add task input, task list display, checkbox toggle, delete functionality

prompt: Create a weather dashboard that displays mock weather data (temperature, conditions, humidity) for a city. Use a nice card-based layout.
expected_features: Weather card, temperature display, conditions icon, humidity percentage, responsive layout

prompt: Build a simple blog homepage that displays 3 blog post cards with title, excerpt, author, and date. Make it look professional.
expected_features: Blog post cards, title and excerpt, author info, date display, grid layout

prompt: Create a contact form with name, email, and message fields. Add form validation and show a success message when submitted.
expected_features: Form inputs, validation, submit button, success message, error handling
